    • cutTooLongString

      public static String cutTooLongString(String str)
      Some strings cannot be over 255 char because of database restriction. Cut it to 252 char then add "..." to indicate the string has been cut.
      Parameters:
      str - the string to cut
      Returns:
      the cut string

    • cutTooLongStringWithOffset

      public static String cutTooLongStringWithOffset(String str, int offset)
      Some strings cannot be over 255 char because of database restriction. Cut it to 252 - offset char then add "..." to indicate the string has been cut. offset must be between 0 and 255. Throw exception if offset is out of bound.
      Parameters:
      str - the string to cut
      offset - the offset to cut
      Returns:
      the cut string

    • escapeHtml

      public static String escapeHtml(String string)
      Escapes the characters in a string using HTML entities.
      Parameters:
      string - the string to escape
      Returns:
      the escaped string

    • reduceLarge

      public static String reduceLarge(String largeStr)
      Cuts the given string into a string of size less than 255 characters if it is larger than 255 characters.
      Parameters:
      largeStr - the large string to cut.
      Returns:
      the cut string.
